verses.1: Topaʼ khut sungah kumpipa om a, lo sunga tui lak bangin a deihna peuh ah hei kawikawi thei hi.
verses.2: Na gamtatna khempeuh nangmah in man na sak hangin Topa in na lungsim tawng a et telna phawk in.
verses.3: Topa in biakpiakna sangin thuman thutang deih zaw hi.
verses.4: Kihisakin gamtatna le kiphatsakna lungsimte pen mawhna hi a, migilo hihna lim ahi hi.
verses.5: Limtakin ngaihsunin geelgeelna pen hauhna lampi hi a, nawhsa-in lopthop hihna pen zawnna lampi ahi hi.
verses.6: Zuaugenna tawh hauhnate bei mang pak a, sihna khuk sung hong tunpih hi.
verses.7: Migilote a manin gamta nuam lo uh ahih manin amauʼ gamtat siatna mah a awk pih uh hi.
verses.8: Mimawhte thukawi-in gamta uh a, midikte a manin gamta uh hi.
verses.9: Phun bek a thei zi tawh inn sungah ten khop sangin inn khumzang kiu khat ah tangten hoih zaw tham hi.
verses.10: Migilote in thusia bekbek deih uh a, a lawmte nangawn zah tuan lo uh hi.
verses.11: Mi kiphasakte gim a kipiak ciangin mi mawkmawkte in pil lawh uh a, mipilte a kihilh ciangin thu theihna-in nei uh hi.
verses.12: Pasian in migilo paʼ inn sungah a kisem khempeuh mu tel a, migilote lawnthalin a siasak hi.
verses.13: Mizawngteʼ huh ngetna a pia nuam lote pen amau zong cimawhin huhna a nget uh ciangin kipia lo ding hi.
verses.14: A simthamin letsong piakna in hehna damsak a, puannuai tawi in sinsona daisak hi.
verses.15: Thutangin na a kisep ciangin midik khempeuh lungdam a, ahi zongin migilote lungkham hi.
verses.16: A kilawm gamtatna pan a pial khia mite misi honte lakah a tung hi.
verses.17: A nop tat nuamte zawng uh a, zu ne-in sathau namtui a nilhte hau lo uh hi.
verses.18: Midikteʼ thuak dingin a bawlsak uh gimnate pen migilote mah in leh thuak zawsop uh hi.
verses.19: A phun hat zi gilo tawh ten khop sangin gam simtham ah khat guak tangten hoih zaw hi.
verses.20: Mipil paʼ inn sungah neihlelam a dimin om a, ahi zongin mihai pa in a ngah zahzah zang khia pah hi.
verses.21: Thuman thutakin gamta tawntung lecin na khan sau-in pahtawina na ngah ding hi.
verses.22: Mipil khat in mi thahatte in a hut khuapi la zo a, amauʼ muanmuan kulhpi nangawn susia zo hi.
verses.23: Kampau a ki-ip zote lungkhamna tawh kipelh hi.
verses.24: Mi kihisak i cihte pen kiliansakin a kiphasak mite ahi hi.
verses.25: Mi thadahpa in na sem nuam lo ahih manin a mahmah a kithattawm ahi hi.
verses.26: Mihoih lote in lungkim hun nei loin deih thuah tawntung uh a, mihoihte cingh-in pia khia tawntung uh hi.
verses.27: Topa in migiloteʼ biakpiaknate deih lo a, ngimna hoih lo tawh a piakte uh deih lo zaw kan lai hi.
verses.28: A man lo tecite mangthang ding uh a, thuman teciteʼ kam kizaza ding hi.
verses.29: Migilote pen muan theih dingin khauh pau uh a, midikte ahihleh lungmuang takin kampau hiathiat uh hi.
verses.30: Mihingteʼ pilna, a thutheihna le a thugente khempeuh, Topaʼ deihna tawh a kituah kei leh a kimanna om lo hi.
verses.31: Galdo nadingin sakolte a baih sa-in kikoih a, ahi zongin gal zawhna pen Topaʼ hang hizaw hi.
